news.headline: Apple Seen Having Strong Holiday Sales. Stock Hits Record High.
news.summary: Apple stock notched a record high after a Wall Street analyst said the consumer electronics giant is likely to have strong holiday season sales.

news.headline: Tesla, Meta and Broadcom Weights Shrink in Nasdaq 100 Rebalance

news.headline: Why Broadcom Was Rallying Again Today
news.summary: Shares of Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO) rallied 5.3% on Monday, as of 1:18 p.m. ET.  Broadcom received a bullish note and price target upgrade from a Wall Street sell-side analyst today, building upon the blowout 2027 guidance management gave on the company's recent earnings call.
